00016 class IpUtility {

00020         'HTTP_CLIENT_IP',

00090     /**
00091      * simplified ip guess, so we don't end up with local ips
00092      * @return string user-ip
00093      */
00094     public function getIp() {
00095         $ip = '0.0.0.0';
00096 
00097         if (!empty($_SERVER['HTTP_X_FORWARDED_FOR'])) {
00098             $ip = $_SERVER['HTTP_X_FORWARDED_FOR'];
00099         } else {
00100             if (!empty($_SERVER['HTTP_CLIENT_IP'])) {
00101                 $ip = $_SERVER['HTTP_CLIENT_IP'];
00102             } else {
00103                 $ip = $_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR'];
00104             }
00105         }
00106 
00107         if (!empty($_SERVER['HTTP_CLIENTADDRESS'])) {
00108             $ip = $_SERVER['HTTP_CLIENTADDRESS'];
00109         }
00110 
00111         return $ip;
00112     }
00113 
00114     /**
00115      * try to do an educated guess about the users real ip, even if he is behind proxies
00116      */
00117     public function getEndIp() {
00118         foreach ($this->simpleHeaders as $header) {
00119             $h = env($header);
00120             if (isset($h) && !empty($h)) {
00121                 return $h;
00122             }
00123         }
00124         return '0.0.0.0';
00125     }
00126 
00127     /**
00128      * is user using a proxy?
00129      * @return bool
00130      */
00131     public function isUsingProxy() {
00132         foreach ($this->proxyHeaders as $header) {
00133             $h = env($header);
00134             if (isset($h) && !empty($h)) {
00135                 return true;
00136                 break;
00137             }
00138         }
00139         return false;
00140     }
00141 
00142     /**
00143      * is user using a handheld device to surf?
00144      * @return bool
00145      */
00146     public function isMobileDevice() {
00147         $agent = env('HTTP_USER_AGENT');
00148         if (empty($agent)) {
00149             return false;
00150         }
00151 
00152         foreach ($this->mobileAgents as $mobile) {
00153             if (false !== strpos($agent,$mobile)) {
00154                 return true;
00155             }
00156         }
00157         return false;
00158     }
00159
